attributes.action: take part in a televised debate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This will: 

Eliminate the need for non-issue, personal attacks through the printed media during campaigns.

Increase public interest in the political process.

Allow potential leaders to express their views in a structured environment.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister regularly takes part in question and answer sessions with members of the public which are broadcast on television and the Number 10 website.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
